nodes.text: Bendu's valley was a valley on the planet Atollon at the center of a mesa near the Coral Mesa. The valley had a ring of nearly a dozen steps into an open flat space, and the krykna and dokma were more prevalent in the area of the valley, though they were unusually at peace. A krykna hive was located in the valley, and convorees were common. The Force-sensitive being, Bendu, dwelled in the valley.
